title: Strengthening Curriculum Development Competencies: Basic Online Workshop on Building Energy Simulation

context.prior_knowledge: Basic knowledge of built environments and understanding of energy concepts
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can navigate the building energy simulation software interface and execute basic analysis functions
Learners can compare efficiency metrics across building types using energy performance concept maps
Learners can analyze real building cases and propose energy-saving measures through CPBL (Collaborative Project-Based Learning) team activities
Learners can explain energy simulation decision-making processes using hypermedia resources in mobile environments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
